content: baby sun hat by sara louise bygvraa materials yarn 100% cotton yarn 170 meters/50 grams yardage aprox 120 meters/35 grams hooks and other supplies 1 crochet hook size 2 5mm tapestry needle gauge blocked 29sc x 33 row/10cm x 10cm note correct gauge is important to get the right size of hat this baby sun hat pattern emerged in my mind after i gave birth to my little baby abbreviations girl and i needed something to cover her single_crochet single_crochet small head double_crochet double_crochet this free version of the slip_stitch slip_stitch pattern only contains size 0-3 month but i also give single_crochet increase 2sc in same some tips how to change the size pattern notes sizing tips to make bigger size you can use heavier yarn and bigger hook or you can continue the increases after round 17 before going to the straight part of hat if you choose the increase option you need to increase the number of single_crochet s between the single_crochet increase when starting the increases after the straight part to get the correct placement of the increases all way round magic loop/ring technique use google to find great tutorials for this technique which makes it possible to close the start up hole completely tight neck string if you want to be able to keep the hat better fastened on baby s head you can add two small strings at sides chain the number of stitches you need to get your preferred length turn and single_crochet back in each chain st use your tapestry needle to attach strings to hat baby sun hat copyright october 2013 sara louise bygvraa
